text.1_Liturgy: Draw your surrendered to your will rendered.
text.2_Liturgy: Your surrendered will run like a gazelle,
text.3_Liturgy: He will bow before your splendor.
text.4_Liturgy: For to him, your love is sweeter,
text.5_Liturgy: Than the dripping honeycomb, and any taste at all.
text.6_Liturgy: Resplendent, beautiful, radiance of the world,
text.7_Liturgy: My soul is sick for your amore,
text.8_Liturgy: Please, O God, heal her now,
text.9_Liturgy: By the beauty of your radiance, by showing her.
text.10_Liturgy: Then she will be strong, she will be healed,
text.11_Liturgy: And she will be your handmaiden forever more.
text.12_Liturgy: Ancient one, rouse, please, your mercy.
text.13_Liturgy: Please have pity on the son of your beloved,
text.14_Liturgy: For so much has this yearning been,
text.15_Liturgy: To see your strength, in its beauty,
text.16_Liturgy: Please, my god, the love of my heart,
text.17_Liturgy: Hurry, please, and do not hide yourself.
text.18_Liturgy: Please, be revealed and spread the covering, beloved,
text.19_Liturgy: Upon me, the shelter of your tranquility
text.20_Liturgy: Illuminate the earth with your nobility
text.21_Liturgy: We will rejoice in you, we will be in festivity
text.22_Liturgy: Hurry, beloved, for the time has come,
text.23_Liturgy: And be good to me, like days long ago.
